1.「キヒヒヒ！| また 来おったか エテーネの民よ！| 今度こそ お前たちの 息の: Khihihihi! You have come again, people of|Etaine! This time, I'll stop you all dead in|your tracks!

2.「時を超えるチカラを秘めた お前たちに| テンスの花を渡すわけには いかんからの: You have the power to transcend time, and I|will not let you have the Tens' flower!

5.「アバさまが 乗っていいって| 言ってくれたんだ！: Lady Ava said I could ride!

8.「村の守り神 カメさまの お背中に| 乗せていただく日が 来ようとは……。| 長: I never thought I'd see the day when I'd be|riding on the back of the village's guardian|turtle... I won't live long...

9.「さあ 行くぞ <kyodai>。| 他の者たちも 乗せてやらねば。: Come on, let's go.<kyodai> Let's get the others on|board...

11.<if_woman>「さあ！ 姉ちゃんも 乗って乗って！| ほら おいらの手に: <if_woman>Come on! Come on, sis. Get in. Get in. Come|on, hold on to my hand...<else>Come on! Get in, get in, get in! Come on,|hold on to my hand...<endif>

21.「おや まだ寝てたのかい？| あんたにしちゃ めずらしいね。: Oh, you're still asleep, huh? That's a shame|for you.

22.「そうだ！ それより 聞いておくれよ！| その <kyodai>がね！: That's right! But listen to me! Listen.<kyodai>Gah!

23.「錬金術で ハツラツ豆を| １０倍に増やすって言ったのに 失敗して| 全部 灰に: I said I'd use alchemy to increase the number|of honeydew beans tenfold, but I failed and|turned them all to ash!

24.「今年最後の ハツラツ豆を……。| アバさまが とーっても| 楽しみにしてらっし: The last of the year's peaches. Ava's been|looking forward to it so much. It's terrible,|isn't it?

26.「言うまでもないけど アバさまの家は| 橋向こうの高台にある 大きな家だからね。: Needless to say, Ava's house is the big one|on the hill over the bridge... I'm counting|on you!

28.「シンイっ！| やっと眠れそうなところだったのに| よくも くだらんことで ジャ: Shinui! Just when I was about to get some|sleep, you interrupt me with your nonsense!

29.「す すみません……。| じつは ハツラツ豆が なくなってしまったので| その代: Sorry... I was actually hoping to replace the|beans we ran out of, but...

30.「なっ……！？| ハ ハツラツ豆が…… なくなったじゃと！？: What the...? The beans... They're gone?

35.「豆が どうのなどと| 言っておられる時では ないわ！: Now's not the time to be talking about beans.

36.「おお <pc>ではないか！| ちょうどよいところに 来てくれたな。| じつは: oh!<pc>Isn't it? You've come to the right place... I|have something to tell you...

37.「……と <kyodai>は 一緒ではないのか？| やれやれ。どうでもいい時には: ... and<kyodai>Aren't they the same? Well... You show up|when it's not important, but not when it's|important...

38.「すまぬが <kyodai>を 呼んできてくれ。| お前たち<pc_rel3>が: I'm sorry.<kyodai>I'll go get... You guys.<pc_rel3>I'd like to talk to you when you're all|here...

39.「ありがとうございます！| では 失礼して……| さっそく 作らせていただきます: Thank you very much. Now, if you'll excuse|me... I'll start working on it...

40.「<pc>さんは| ご存知なかったかもしれませんが……。| じつは 私…… さい: <pc>I don't know if you knew this, but... I'm|actually... I'm good at rewriting...

41.「おばあさまの服も| いつも 私が作っているんですよ。: I always make my grandmother's clothes...

43.「ほら！ 香りも 肌ざわりも 申し分ない。| 最高の安眠まくらの 完成です！: Look at that! The scent, the feel, the|lusciousness... The perfect pillow for a good|night's sleep.

44.「<pc>さんが 集めてくださった| もみガラと お茶の葉の効果で| おばあさま: <pc>I'm sure the rice husks and tea leaves you've|collected will help Grandmother sleep|soundly.

45.「さあ！ さっそく おばあさまに| 使っていただきましょう！| 一緒に 向かいの: Come on! Let's get on with it, grandmother!|Please come with me to the other room!

46.「これと これも 入れて……| フタを閉めて……。: Put this one in there, and this one, and...|Close the lid...

47.「よーし……。| 今度こそ すっごいのが できるぞ。| きっと……。: Okay... I'm going to get a great one... It's|gonna be...

48.なんと ごきげんなぼうしが できた！: Oh, my God, I made a happy hat!

50.「やったあっ！| なんか すっごいの できた！: I did it! I made something amazing!

52.<if_woman>「いいところに来たね！| これ…… 姉ちゃんに プレゼント！: <if_woman>You've come to the right place! This... It's|for my sister! I think she'll like it!<else>You've come to the right place! This... It's|for you, brother! I think he'll like it!<endif>

54.「あれ？ かばんが いっぱいだね。| しょうがないから おいらが 持っておくよ。: What? My bag is full... I don't know what to|do. I'll just...

55.<if_woman>「で 姉ちゃんは こんな所まで| わざわざ なにしに来たの？: <if_woman>So what did you come all the way here for?<else>So what did you come all the way here for?<endif>

56.「……えっ？| アバさまが おいらを呼んでる？: ... What? Lady Ava wants to see me?

58.「それって ついに アバさまが| おいらの錬金術を 頼りにする日が| 来たってこ: Doesn't that mean the day has finally come|for Ava-sama to rely on my alchemy?

59.<if_woman>「さあ 姉ちゃん！| アバさまの所へ 行こう～！ おいらが作: <if_woman>Come on, sis! Let's go to Ava's! Don't forget|about the hat I made for you... Don't forget|it!<else>Come on, big brother! Let's go to Ava's!|Don't forget about the hat I made for you...|Don't forget it!<endif>

62.「<pc>さん。私が 起こしますよ。| 寝起きの おばあさまは 機嫌が悪いので…: <pc>Three. I woke her up... Grandmother's in a|bad mood, so...

63.「失礼します おばあさま。| <pc>さんが <kyodai>さんを| 連れてい: Excuse me. Aunt...<pc>longevity celebration (on one's 40th, 50th, 60th, etc. birthday)<kyodai>He's here with Miss...

68.「……おかげで 寝覚めも よかった。| なかなか いい まくらじゃったぞい。: And... That's what keeps me awake. It's a|nice pillow...

71.「では シンイ！ 村の者たちを集めよ！| これより カメさまのお告げを 皆に伝え: Then, Xin Yi! Gather the villagers! I will|now tell them what the turtle has told me!

73.「エテーネの民たちよ！| 心して 聞くがよい！: People of Etaine! Hear me! Hear me!

74.「わしは カメさまからの お告げをたまわる| 巫女として 託された お告げを|: I am a priestess who receives omens from the|turtle, and I will tell you exactly what she|tells me!

75.「まもなく このエテーネの村は……: Soon, this village of Etaine will be...

76.「大いなる災厄に見舞われ 滅びる！| エテーネの民は ひとり残らず| 死に絶える: There will be a great calamity and we will|perish! Every last one of the people of|Etaine will perish!

78.「エテーネの民は 死に絶えるだろう……| だが 光明が 残されていないわけではな: The people of Etaine will die out. But that|does not mean that there is no light left in|the world!

79.「北の 清き水の洞くつに咲く 伝説の霊草| テンスの花があれば 滅びの運命から|:
In the North, in the caverns of clear water,|there is a legendary herb, the tench flower,|that will save us from certain doom. That's|
|what I'm saying!

80.「テンスの花を 採りにいくのは| わしの孫のシンイと <pc>！: It's my grandson Xinyi who's going to pick the tench flowers.<pc>！

82.「大いなる災厄は そこまで迫っておる！| だが わしも チカラを尽くす！: A great evil is at hand! But I'll do my best!

83.「このわしが カメさまと共に| エテーネの村を 守りきってみせるわ！！: I will defend the village of Etaine with you,|turtle!

85.「さあ 急ぎましょう！ 清き水の洞くつは| 育みの大地よりも はるか遠い 北にあ:
Come on, let's hurry! The Cave of Clear|Waters is farther north than the land of|nurture... We'll say our prayers at my house|
|and be on our way soon!

87.<center>エテーネの民 <pc>よ……。|さあ 目を覚ましなさい。: the people of Ethene<pc>Hey... Come on, wake up...

88.<center>冥王のチカラにより|あなたの命は尽きましたが その魂には|まだ: The Dark Lord's power has ended your life,|but your soul still has a mission to|fulfill...

89.<center>隔絶された島で 生きてきた|あなたたち エテーネの民は|知らない: You and the rest of Etaine's people, who have|lived on this isolated island, do not know...

90.<center>これより ５人の神々が|あなたに チカラを貸してくれます。: From now on, five gods will lend you their|power...

91.<center>さあ 神の像の前にゆき|どの姿に生まれ変わるか 決めるのです。: Now, you will go before the statue of God and|decide in which form you will be reborn...

103.<if_woman>「イヤだよ！ 姉ちゃん！！| おいらを ひとりにしないで！！: <if_woman>No! No! Sis! Don't leave me here alone!<else>No! No! Brother! Don't leave me alone!<endif>

109.「<pc>さん。| テンスの花は 私が 命に代えても| 必ず おばあさまに 届け: <pc>Miss. Even if it costs me my life, I'll make|sure Tens' flowers get to Grandmother!

112.「こいつです 冥王さま！| あの術を 使いやがったのはっ！: It's him, Lord of the Underworld! He's the|one who used the spell!

113.「やはり 時渡りの術を使う者が 現れたか。: I knew there was someone out there who could|use the time travel...

114.「だが ネズミ１匹 逃がしたところで| この冥王ネルゲルを 阻むことはできぬ。: But even if I let one mouse escape, it will|not stop this Dark Lord Nergel...

115.「冥王とは あまねく 死を統べる者。| 生きとし生ける者が 死から逃れられぬよう: "The Dark Lord rules over all death... Just|as no living thing can escape death, so no|one can escape me.

116.「いまわしき 時渡りの術者よ！| 灼熱の獄炎で その身を 焼き尽くしてやろう！: O thou who art the time traveler! I will|consume you in a fiery inferno!

135.「<pc>か！？| くそっ！ 余計なことすんじゃねえ！！| オレと お前は 死ぬ: <pc>Oh, my God! Damn it! You don't have to do|this! You and me, we're gonna die together!

136.「ちょっと！ <pc>！| 勝手なことすんじゃないわよ！| あんたを守るのは あ: Hey!<pc>No! Don't you dare do anything on your own!|I'm the one who's supposed to protect you!

137.<if_woman>「イヤだよ！ お姉ちゃん！！| 私を ひとりにしないで！！<: <if_woman>No! No! Sis! Don't leave me alone!<else>No! No! Big brother! Don't leave me alone!<endif>

144.「おかしいですね。| 魔物たちが １匹も いないなんて。: It's funny... There's no demons here...

145.「ねえ 今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。: Hey, the direction that the thunder just|hit...

146.「村の方角です！ 急ぎましょうっ！！: It's in the direction of the village! We must|hurry!

147.「なあ 今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。: You know, the direction that the thunder just|hit...

148.「ねえ 今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。: Hey, the direction that the thunder just|hit...

149.「い…今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。: Uh... The direction that the thunder just|hit...

151.「じゃが…… たとえ この身が果てようとも| 冥王さまより与えられし 使命だけは: But... But even if my life ends, the Dark|Lord has given me a mission!

153.「冥王さま……！| 時を 超える…… エテーネの民は……| め…冥王さまの 手で: Lord of the underworld...! The timeless...|The people of Etaine... ... By the hand of|the Dark Lord... Destroy them all!

154.「ど どうしよう……。| テンスの花が 全部 焼けちゃった……。: I don't know... All the tench flowers are|burned...

155.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわからないこと言って| おいらたちの ジャマを: I can't believe you're going to interfere|with us by saying things like "transcending|time"...

157.「私たち エテーネの民は はるか昔| 自由に時を超えられる 時渡りの術という能力: We, the people of Etaine, long ago possessed|the ability to travel through time at will...

158.「ですが 時渡りの術を使える者は| 時代と共に 少なくなっていき| 数百年前に:
But the number of people who could use the|Time Warp became fewer and fewer over time...|until it was completely lost hundreds of|
|years ago.

159.「そうだったんだ……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: That's right... I can't believe I'm being put|through this because of an ability that's no|longer with me!

160.「ダメだ…… 見つからない……。| テンスの花が １本でも残っていれば| おばあ: No... I can't find it... If I had just one|Tens flower left, I could've done what|Grandmother asked!

161.「……仕方ありません。村に帰りましょう。| 他に 大いなる災厄を止める手立てが|: ... I have no choice... I must return to the|village... Perhaps there is another way to|stop the great evil...

169.「よくぞ 見つけてくださいました！| これさえあれば 村を……| 滅びの運命から: I'm so glad you found it! With this, we may|save our village... Could be saved from|certain doom!

170.「よかった。| おいらも 役に立てたんだね！: Hey... I'm glad I could be of service!

171.<if_woman>「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| おいらの役目だ: <if_woman>I'm sure it was my duty to find the tens|flower here... Sis, thank you for bringing me|here!<else>I'm sure it was my duty to find the tens|flower here... Thank you, brother, for|bringing me here!<endif>

173.「さあ この花を| おばあさまに 届けなくては！| 急ぎましょう！: Come on, we've got to get these flowers to|Grandmother! We must hurry!

174.「ど どうすんだ……。| テンスの花が みんな 焼けちまったのか？: I don't know what to do. Did all the Tens'|flowers get burned?

176.「ど どうしたらいいの……？| テンスの花が 全部 燃えちゃった。: What am I supposed to do? All of Tens'|flowers are on fire.

177.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわからないことを言って| オレたちの ジャマし: He said something about transcending time...|and then he interrupted us.

178.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわかんないこと言って| あたしたちの ジャマを: You can't just say things like "transcend|time" and then interfere with us...

179.「時を超えるとかなんとか| わけのわからないこと言って 私たちの| ジャマをする: I can't believe you'd interfere with us by|saying something that doesn't make any sense,|like timelessness...

180.「そうだったのか……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: I didn't know that... I'm not sure I'd want|to be put through all this for an ability|that's no longer with me.

181.「そうだったんだ……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: Oh, my God. I can't believe I'm being put|through this because of an ability that's no|longer with me!

182.「そうだったんだ……。| 今はもうない能力なのに そのために| こんな目にあわさ: It was... It's a gift that's no longer with|us, and we're being put through this because|of it.

194.「えへへへ……。| 私も 役に立てて うれしいな～！: Heh heh heh... I'm glad I could be of service|too!

195.「たぶん ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| オレの役目だったのかもな！ <pc: Maybe it was my job to find Tens' flowers|here!<pc>Thanks for bringing me all the way out here!

196.「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| あたしの役目だったのね。<pc>|: I'm sure it was my job to find the tens|flower here...<pc>Thank you for bringing me this far!

197.<if_woman>「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが| 私の役目だった: <if_woman>I'm sure it was my duty to find the tens|flower here... Thank you for bringing me|here, Sis!<else>I'm sure it was my job to find the tens|flower here... Thank you, big brother, for|bringing me here!<endif>

198.「ここです。| テンスの花は この扉の向こうに咲いていると| 書物に 記されてい: The... It is written that the tens bloom|behind this door.

199.「最後に この扉が開かれたのは| いったい いつのことか| 私には 想像もつきま: I can't imagine when the last time this door was opened, but...

200.「この洞くつに流れる 清き水が 今も| テンスの花を 育み続けてくれているはず。: The clear water that flows through this cave|continues to nurture the tench flower...

202.「いまわしき テンスの花は| この魔導鬼ベドラーさまが| すべて 焼き尽くしてく: The Tens' flowers will be burned to a crisp|by the demon Bedlam!

204.「キヒヒヒ！ お前らは エテーネの民か！: Khihihihihi! You are the people of Etaine!

205.「じゃが そうはいかんぞ！| 時を超えるチカラを秘めた お前たちに| この花を渡: But that is not to be! You have the power to|transcend time, and I will not let you have|this flower!

206.「<pc>さん……。| やはり…… お話ししておきます。: <pc>Miss... I knew it... Let me tell you|something...

207.「じつは おばあさまが 気になることを| つぶやいていらっしゃったのです。: You know, your grandmother mentioned|something that was bothering her...

209.「たとえ 滅亡の運命から| 逃れることが できたとしても……: Even if you could escape your fate...

210.「……生き残れるのは| たった ひとり……と。: ... Only one of us will survive. ....

212.「ひとりって…… それって……| 他の人は みんな 死んじゃうってこと？: Alone... Does that mean... Does that mean|that everyone else is gonna die?

213.「それは 私にも わかりませんが| 言葉のままに 受け取るなら| そういうことだ: I don't know what that means, but if you take|it at face value, I think it means...

215.「気を落とさないでください。| ……おそらく おばあさまは| 最悪の場合のことを: Don't lose heart... ... Perhaps your|grandmother was referring to the worst-case|scenario...

216.「カメさまの お告げどおり| テンスの花さえあれば 村は助かるとも| おばあさま: My grandmother said that if we only had the|tench flowers, as the turtle said, the|village would be saved.

217.「だから 今は おばあさまの言葉を信じて| 必ず テンスの花を 村へ持ちかえりま: So for now, let's believe in Grandmother's|words and make sure we bring the Tens flowers|back to the village!

218.「そうだよね……！ おいらも信じる！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって: I know, right? I believe it too! I believe|that as long as we have Tens' flowers, we can|save everyone!

225.「ひとりって…… それって……| 他のヤツは みんな 死んじまうってことか？: Alone... Does that mean... Does that mean|that everyone else is gonna die?

227.「ひとりって…… それって……| 他の人は みんな 死んじゃうってこと？: Alone... Does that mean... Does that mean|that everyone else is gonna die?

231.「そうだよな……！ オレも信じる！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって: You're right. I believe it too! I believe|that as long as we have the Tens flower, we|can save everyone!

232.「そうよね……！ あたしも信じるわ！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって: You're right. I believe it too! I believe|that as long as we have Tens' flowers, we can|save everyone!

233.「そうだよね……！ 私も信じる！| テンスの花さえあれば| みんな助かるって 信: You're right...! I believe it too! I believe|that as long as we have Tens' flowers, we can|save everyone!

234.<pc>は|岩に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。: You read the words carved into the rock.

235.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた|すべての 生きとし生ける者は|: Every living thing that has ever lived in|peace on this world is in danger of|extinction.

236.<center>今 空には ふたつの太陽が 昇っている。|ふたつめの太陽…… そ: Now there are two suns in the sky... The|second sun... Since its appearance, this|world has become a hell...

237.<center>いまわしき ふたつめの太陽は 自在に空を駆け|大地を焼き 海を干:
The second sun, the one that's nowhere to be|found, will soar through the sky, scorch the|earth, dry up the seas, and plunge people|
|into a fiery despair.

238.<center>太陽が ふたつになった理由など 知る由もない。|わかっていること: We don't know why there are two suns. What we|do know is that all life on Earth is about to|be destroyed.

239.「こんな所にも いしずえの森と同じような| 壁画があったのですね。: There was a mural just like the one in the|Ischizue Forest...

241.「……私は 以前から| いしずえの森の岩に 描かれていた絵を| 不思議な気持ちで: ... I've been looking at the paintings on the|rocks in the forest for some time with a|sense of wonder...

242.「人間以外の種族が 本当にいたのだとしたら| 彼らは どこに行ってしまったのだろ: If there really were non-human species, I|wonder where they've gone...

243.「もしかしたら ここに書かれているとおり| ほとんどの者たちが滅亡し…… 私たち: Maybe it's just as it says here, that most of|them perished... We, humans, may be the only|ones who survived.

247.「これと これも 入れるだろ……| んで フタを閉めて……。: You can put this in there and this... And|then you close the lid...
